CustomField.description: If Account.PO Number Required? = true then set SO Creation - PO Number = '', else 'Not required by Client'
CustomField.formula: IF( Account.PO_Number_Required__c = TRUE, '', 'Not required by Client')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Account.PO Number Required? = true then set SO Creation - PO Number = '', else 'Not required by Client'
CustomField.label: SO Creation - PO Number
